Letter to Respected Manager of The Bank of Punjab Main Bedian Road Branch, Lahore Cantt.

Subject Matter: this Letter of intimation is addressed to manager and/or employees of The Bank of Punjab about the Civil Case, involving latter itemized cheques in the body of the letter as a subject of it. Therefore, any attempt to encash them will attract contempt of court.

I (Malik Tariq Aziz Awan; NIC No. 35202-6022494-5), the account holder (Account No. 6020-0453-1100-0014) of the said Bank, have written this letter to intimate The Bank of Punjab through its manager and/or employees about the case instituted related to following cheque numbers in the civil court, Lahore. Whereof, an attested order of the court is annexed herewith:

It is to reiterate that the above-mentioned cheques are a subject matter of the civil case, copy of which is annexed, therefore the matter is sub-judice in the court, any effort to encash the cheques will attract contempt of court.
The Bank of Punjab account holder,
Name: Mr. Malik Tariq Aziz Awan
